HostVPS offer an enterprise grade VPS service at affordable prices. We offer a competitively priced VPS hosting service with a fast network and undersold servers that our clients can enjoy with the least amount of usage restrictions possible.
 
All HostVPS staff have a minimum of 10 years plus experience in hosting services, computer hardware and network engineering and focus on providing our clients with the best VPS hosting services possible.
 
HostVPS have been providing high performance VPS hosting services since 2005 and web hosting, computer/server hardware repair, network engineering and I.T. consulting services since the nineties.

  We offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee on our services and accept payment by all major credit cards via PayPal, we offer 7 day money back guarantee on all our hosting services. 

Our network terms allow any legal usage that does not adversely affect other users on our nodes or network. For more information, please read [Our Terms](http://www.hostvps.net/terms-of-service.php) and [Usage Policy](http://www.hostvps.net/acceptable-usage-policy.php) or [Contact Us](https://www.hostvps.net/contact.php) for more information.
